## Description {#details}

Provides API functions, like <a href="#a6ca3df0dddca4fe048a4bdb535362010">getIterator()</a> and <a href="#ac80dadfb9db2288710b8d145fe27ad84">getReverseIterator()</a> to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/globalifunc">GlobalIFunc</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/function">Function</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/globalvariable">GlobalVariable</a> and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/globalalias">GlobalAlias</a>.

In LLVM IR these are provided by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node">ilist&#95;node</a>.

Definition at line 767 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/constant-h">Constant.h</a>.
